name: Birthday Taxi
description:
Birthday Taxi

Pickup and deliver as many birthday gifts as you can before time runs out.

If the game doesn't detect your controller,  try reconnecting it with the game open.

Programming - QuietBenchZen

  • Website - QuietBenchZen.com

Music and Sound Design - Austin Blau

  • Instagram - @Austin_Blau_
  • Website - AustinBlau.com

Game and Level Design - Jhifara

Tileset - RPG Urban Pack by Kenney

  • Some supplemental tiles and sprites were added by Jhifara

Font - Hknaki by Psy Zo Lab

Created for Weekly Game Jam 178 "Birthday Gift"
